Pancreatic islets datasets:

- [scRNA-seq data from Segerstolpe et al. (2016)](https://github.com/meichendong/SCDC/tree/master/vignettes/data/segerstolpe.rds)
- [scRNA-seq data from Segerstolpe et al. (2016) after clustering QC](https://github.com/meichendong/SCDC/tree/master/vignettes/data/qc_segerstolpe.rds)
- [scRNA-seq data from Baron et al. (2017) after clustering QC](https://github.com/meichendong/SCDC/tree/master/vignettes/data/qc_baron.rds)
- [scRNA-seq data from Xin et al. (2016) after clustering QC](https://github.com/meichendong/SCDC/tree/master/vignettes/data/qc_xin.rds)

- [bulk RNA-seq data from Fadista et al. (2014)](https://github.com/meichendong/SCDC/tree/master/vignettes/data/fadista_77.rds)
